member.name: T:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema
member.summary: Colors to use when writing to the console.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Debug
member.summary: The color to use for debug messages. Default is dark gray on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Info
member.summary: The color to use for informational messages. Default is gray on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Warn
member.summary: The color to use for warning messages. Default is dark red on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Error
member.summary: The color to use for error messages. Default is red on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Alert
member.summary: The color to use for alert messages. Default is dark yellow on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Critical
member.summary: The color to use for critical messages. Default is yellow on black.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorSchema.Emergency
member.summary: The color to use for emergency messages. Default is white on red.

member.name: T:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme
member.summary: Color scheme for logging messages.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme.Foreground
member.summary: Foreground color.

member.name: F:SyslogLogging.ColorScheme.Background
member.summary: Background color.

member.summary: Instantiates a new color scheme.
